thread.title: Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house!
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house!

author: Rashmi Mishra | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house!
text:
Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 11, 2015 at 3:37 PM Comments There is so much of hype around India’s biggest reality TV show, Bigg Boss . After eight successful seasons, get ready for exciting Bigg Boss Nau or Bigg Boss 9 . Everything about the show becomes a hot topic, be it the suspense over the host or the contestants list or the stylishly furnish Bigg Boss house, where all the drama unfolds. The producers Endemol Shine India and show’s beloved host, Bollywood actor Salman Khan has already got the viewers glued with its catchy promos and now with the leaked pictures of Bigg Boss 9 house plastered all over the internet, the anticipation is only increasing. Also Read: Bigg Boss 9 Final List of Confirmed Contestants Out: Salman Khan’s reality show participants promise ‘Double Trouble’! Every promo of Bigg Boss 9 had Salman hinting at the coming trouble in pair. The pictures of the Bigg Boss house leaked online live up to the tagline of the show, ‘Double Trouble’. The readers can see the highly decorated area, which has been styled tastefully. Everything will be in pair, be it the furniture including beds. If the reports are to be believed, Bigg Boss 9 house boasts of an upper floor with garden area, where couples/pairs can spend quality time (read: plot against others). #BB9DoubleTrouble House Pictures Without WaterMark (Set-1) pic.twitter.com/Bv7g9yMyBO 
— BIGG BOSS Newz (@biggbossnewz) October 9, 2015 The chalet-styled house, where contestants of the ninth edition of the reality TV show will compete for the coveted trophy and prize money, was designed by “Mary Kom” director Omung Kumar, said Deepak Dhar, managing director of Endemol Shine India, the producers of “Bigg Boss Nau”. This time the captain of the house will get a huge white single couch place right at the entrance to the bedroom. pic.twitter.com/HyoyzfalVh 
— BIGG BOSS Newz (@biggbossnewz) October 11, 2015 The 14-bed dormitory was in a pair of seven, facing a cheeky candy pink lounging sofa. At the back of the beds were bright coloured cushions pinned to the wall. A silhouette of a man holding a woman on the wall highlighted the romance factor, which is so prominent on the show. Asked if the show will get any bolder than before, Dhar told IANS: “I can’t really tell if it’s going to be bolder or will it be tamer, that really depends on the house mates, on how they really project themselves.” 
— BIGG BOSS Newz (@biggbossnewz) October 11, 2015 The “Bigg Boss Nau” bathroom is a distinct French “Moulin Rouge” experience with typical shades of red and blubs ringing the mirror to light up the participants as they prune themselves. The journalists were served breakfast and then the commanding voice of “Big Boss” announced: “Nominations ki prakriya shuru hogayi hai (the process for nominations has begun)”. 
— BIGG BOSS Newz (@biggbossnewz) October 11, 2015 The Yin and Yang pools punctuate the gardens, with lounging bed for sun-bathers. The balcony overlooks a lush green garden, with a purpose of accentuating courtship among the attending couples, while the living room contained a purple sofa, multi-coloured cushions and shaded chandeliers facing toward the “Me TV”, a major prop in the show. The dining area stretched to an open kitchen but the most interesting part was the 14 multi-coloured seats attached to each other in pairs. 
— BIGG BOSS Newz (@biggbossnewz) October 11, 2015 The audiences must have picked up clues over the contestants being paired up from the promos. Reports from Bollywood of Cinema also confirms over it by saying that the contestants will enter the house with their hands tied with their partners. Sounds interesting. Fourteen celebrity contestants, with different temperaments will live inside the Bigg Boss 9 house as seven pair. They will be within the four walls and under the same roof and under the constant gaze of over 100 cameras as Bigg Boss Nau — the ninth edition of the Indian version of the international reality TV show Big Brother – from October 11 on. (Inputs from IANS and Photo Credits: Twitter). 
  3:37 PM Topics:
